comments.body:
Do you know what versions were causing an issue? 
```
$ pip freeze | grep boto
boto==2.49.0
boto3==1.3.0
botocore==1.4.1
```
I tested back to 1.3.0 which was released in March, 2016. A lot of AWS modules need more up-to-date libraries, but if you can pinpoint what the issue was (or share a traceback so I can look for the problem) we could document that since using the local list of such an old version would omit many of the regions and might cause problems for people if they assume all regions are being collected.
i was told by 'people in irc' .. so i dont have specific versions
